{{Infobox weapon poe2
| name              = Rust's Poignard
| icon              = poe2_stiletto_rusts_poignard_icon.png
| description       = The assassin known as Rust once carried this simple blade. A consummate "artist," he preferred to paint his humble masterpieces with a single fluid thrust, preferably between the vertebrae at the base of the skull or between the ribs closest to the heart. This stiletto has a particularly narrow cross section and, unlike its former owner, is meticulously polished.
